entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023
